OB a
Crl.MC.No. 8707 of 2018 2011KERMAL
2
ORDER

Learned counsel appearing for the
petitioner seeks permission to withdraw this
petition with liberty to challenge the order framing
charge by the court, if he is otherwise entitled to
do so.

Permission granted.

Accordingly this Crl.M.C is dismissed as
withdrawn reserving liberty with the petitioner to
challenge the order framing charge by the court, if
he is otherwise entitled to do so.

Sd/-
K.ABRAHAM MATHEW,
